page.title: 12Life Styles
page.content: {An ordinary day in the life of an 8 } {year old boy. I woke up it was Wednesday morning and 7a.m. Fifteen minutes later I got up and had a wash and put on my school uniform. I went to the kitchen and had my breakfast and off to school. I arrived at school put my sandwiches in the kitchen then off to the classroom to do some Maths. Later I went into the hall to help four other boys prepare for Assembly. We were responsible for the religious service that day. When we went back to the classroom it was time for Calculator Maths. Playtime. Afterwards English work until the dinner bell rang. We had our sandwiches and played this time it was Football. Rounders against Moreton Morrell was cancelled, so it was Cycling Proficiency. Home to watch telelvision and bed.
